word: I saw that when the message shall increase greatly in power, then the providence of God will open and prepare the way in the East for much more to be accomplished than can be at the present time. God will then send some of His servants in power to visit places where little or nothing can now be done, and some who are now indifferent will be aroused and will take hold of the truth. [THE REMAINDER OF THIS ARTICLE IS FROM A VISION GIVEN AT ROUND GROVE, ILLINOIS, DECEMBER 9, 1856.]
